page.description: Client-side events for the Tabbed UI Component.

item.name: [afterAjaxCallbackComplete]
item.description: Fires after an Ajax callback has completed.

item.name: [afterLogin]
item.description: Fires after the callback that occurs when the user tries to login to the application has completed.

item.name: [afterLogout]
item.description: Fires after the callback that occurs when a user logs out fo the application has completed.

item.name: [beforeHTMLReportExport]
item.description: Fires when the user clicks a toolbar button to export an HTML report to PDF, Excel, Word, or text.

item.name: [beforeLogin]
item.description: Fires before the callback that occurs when the user clicks the 'Login' button after filling in their credentials.

item.name: [canLogin]
item.description: Fires before the callback that occurs when a user tries to login to the application. Return false to cancel the login.

item.name: [canLogout]
item.description: Fires before the callback that occurs when a user tries to log out of the application. Return false to cancel the logout.

item.name: [onPusherMessage]
item.description: Fires when the app receives a message from the Pusher service.

item.name: [onRenderComplete]
item.description: Last event to fire when the Tabbed UI is rendered.
